original_text: So the man sent another servant to the farmers. They also hit this servant on the head, and they did other bad things to him.
korean_text: 다시 다른 종을 보내니 그의 머리에 상처를 내고 능욕하였거늘

sentences.original_text: So the man sent another servant
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 사람은 또 다른 종을 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: They also hit this servant on the head
and they did other bad things to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그에게 다른 나쁜 짓들도 했습니다
